com.csahmad.moodcloud

Class ElasticSearchController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.csahmad.moodcloud.ElasticSearchController

  • public class ElasticSearchController
extends java.lang.Object
    Get ElasticSearchObjects using elasticsearch or add/update ElasticSearchObjects using elasticsearch.
    See Also:
    ElasticSearch

      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetById<T extends ElasticSearchObject>
      For getting an object by ID.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetCount<T extends ElasticSearchObject>
      For counting the number of objects that match the given restrictions.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetItems<T extends ElasticSearchObject>
      For searching for objects that match the given restrictions using elasticsearch.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.GetTermAggregations
      For getting term aggregations (number of occurrences for terms) via elasticsearch.
      static class  ElasticSearchController.RefreshIndex
      For refreshing an elasticsearch index to ensure changes are visible everywhere.
